positive.name: Bone-Iron
positive.description: Dense skeleton and musculature; reduced bleed duration and improved stability.

positive.name: Anvil Stance
positive.description: Set feet, take the hit: better bracing and blocking; slightly heavier step cost.

positive.name: Rune-Sense
positive.description: Attunement to etched pattern; subtle awareness of runes and bound mediums.

negative.name: Stiff Joints
negative.description: Cold stone and old work leave their mark; a touch slower to start moving.

negative.name: Gravel Voice
negative.description: Voice like a quarry; less quiet, more commanding.

negative.name: Deepcall Dreams
negative.description: The stone hums in sleep; sometimes it answers.

definitions.pattern: The abstract geometry to be etched or inscribed.
definitions.medium: The material substrate (plate, bone-ash, glass, vein-stone).
definitions.binding: The final seating of intent; sets cost, risk, and channel.

misfires.description: A hairline crack births an echo that mimics recent sound; nuisance but dangerous in cramped halls.
The medium fails; nearby structure must check integrity or collapse partially.
Binding rebounds and etches itself into skin; permanent scar and minor sanity test.

deep_holds.notes: Higher gravity cuts both ways; dwarves thrive, others tire.

lore.origins: Craft of Adam, guard of Kha’in; bound to stone, not Veil.
lore.aging: Ageless in face; strength accrues with centuries, yet death by force remains.
lore.politic: Cold Peace with the elves since the Tide of Cracks; tribute and proxy cuts.
